function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Validate transmission rate estimates with multiple sources of data and incorporate uncertainty in the estimation structure data into the model to better understand and address age-specific transmission dynamics","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporate travel
